text: En Todo Estaré (English: I'll Be In Everything) is the 15th studio album by Puerto Rican performer Chayanne. This album was released on August 25, 2014. ==Track list== ==Reception== The album was well received by critics on AllMusic where it got a 3.5 star rating. It also received gold and platinum certifications in several countries in America such as Mexico and Chile.Chayanne recibió el “Disco de Platino” por su nuevo álbum ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Charts (2014) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Argentinian Albums (CAPIF) To view the chart position Select '2014' and 'Agosto'. |align="center"|1 |- ! scope="row"|Mexican Albums (AMPROFON) |align="center"|1 |- |- !scope="row"|Uruguayan Albums (CUD) |align="center"|18 |- |- |- |- |} ==Sales and certifications== ==See also== *List of number-one Billboard Latin Albums from the 2010s *List of number-one albums of 2014 (Spain) ==References== Category:2014 albums Category:Chayanne albums Category:Sony Music Latin albums
title: En Todo Estaré
